_route: (==) This route is tighter for BM. There's an older route that gets BM sooner .link([here]https://celer.itntpiston.app/#/gh/iTNTPiston/botw-routes/aq) if you need

Plateau: (==) The items marked with [IST] are used to break slots. You need to keep at least 3 of them

_Equipment::Weapon<Torch + Axe>.notes: You can jump off the rock the old man is on, grab the torch midair, and the old man won't talk to you

Plateau: Surf down to TOT, clip through

_Equipment::Bow<Bow + Arrow>.notes: Need at least 3 arrows starting IST. Preferably 4 or 5. Can get RNG arrow from metal crates at Mag

_Shrine::OwaDaim.notes: We are grabbing hammer later in Hateno. Go for stasis wb if you want

_Material<Lotus, 5>.notes: 3 for an early speedfood, 2 for later speedfood

BLSS .dir(NE) to Guard Chamber.notes: Go for unloaded gate but can clip in

Royal Claymore + RGC.notes: Everything here is like Any%, up to the lizal sneakstrike and cooking. Do get razorshroom and naydra fang

Kill .enemy(Stalker).notes: need 1 Shaft 2 Spring 2 Screws. Kill up to 3. Order of picking these up does NOT matter

_Npc<Hestu>.notes: Talk twice, turn in korok seed

_Material<Amber>.notes: 84% chance from 3 normal ores, don't break rare ore because we BLSS off it

Hateno: (==) IST START (.link([Simulator File]https://ist.itntpiston.app/?c=H4sIAAAAAAACA31WTXPbNhC981fsjA5tM5ppJVtpLz04tmN74tgeSamn0%2FEBEiESFUSwAGhF%2BfV9uwApZZL2YAskFvvxdt8DR%2FRkVdSqKyodaUKBn%2Bgthdo7t6Mpqba1GhvR%2BXWNX%2FWZt1vdttrjsXXRmpL3vXrVllZuTzNS3rt9oHNyfoW9CibaFyNaKLgxdO%2F2xQ3CzbCKXZD1xnkdIpV7bS08r7LJGemm7LyiNfuMRx%2B3pqqLa8UW9cEa1eSMzyi0Zn3oM8wFiK9z8l2ygpuPrqroXkXVyB4Sld%2FJL4RwcIeTe%2BdKWK5sCCifKiCTbMi7g7K0tuqwQ9rDi6pTvhxei61XX5zPQfm5UQfaqKbKxalmbXQTE2CUvUdvVrDXHnbckqiBifmibKiNtmXxbGKNs4Id0hyKunRuS8HscPKvnSvNxmj%2Fe2i1Ll8EqbSFij4Ya6lruSjAFZXdah%2FGwABdIrchALg1iA2TVvkYqHQ6ND9E2qkY4SGl2ecearWJDHT%2F3Ho%2BfPpm7XVq50YZf%2BAM1EHRs2rGtOVckANSoD0XJlDkENsGXY5vwh6p4XGdwOZejehKbRUtuxCybXq7VNbV9KB0NUbWnHOVuzuiWwxYN6b5zaVExZvndwkD9lvq1gWDYvmA2q2Qz4%2FJw8prtaVYa3QThq7RP%2FUQsBn8vLtfLNjTx4Oqd3RRqUYVc71zr5p%2BzfNUXHnXZrqkNTPmDc%2F59T%2Bdaf%2BLAKmwAHIhju8aDrO2DkCF2rV4d3N%2Ft7y8pcXyYr4sUqoz0NihEsFz0nN5cmTtV5zKk47XOdPvOJkeBWEgVj93WA6USZ0OKIEU%2FjDtJeLwwMuztF9WmVtzXXVWebpbLOmqazVQs07xzmWt11uaTslEvQtF2bRyLg%2BXLGXueCVzwYsTtiUTTkdWqVMCo%2B9DpO5j9mKniwXnfDbNo2J57uDXCQ%2FQtQSDiGDuV1pzXmmF2cOEJA4dXCeH6erxetGzRmh7TvMTRRDGTmjXIxm2en9K3h2n8VLs08lE%2BAmj%2BkY0ZP0%2FhJczs9zpLJ5ivze2rLzWzfGIGL0UJU%2FlwLLUSq5vmqHOW9PMjmyCxFJTgohM6szQgTQtBdB5fzdHk28v7t8DlYdrflU5bkCLBOvEOpGlyqtSh54%2FZ7SQ4Gd0ycHPcl6j%2FUqaxxzQOWyawjQrkjHfFnCruV87FqLUHTCNK%2FFdG41rcju%2FUVkoDOMhw6pV6xrSn9e6jawficDHS1H4wzdjvglOboYkYdRL2Km2IwSiIkTA9VhIlt%2B%2FSMCG2%2BvLD3T38Mf1w%2FJx%2Fid9vADni2KRZIGLhFYfq9sY3NlT7LCSi9JjNLm9rS5zNYPes7bTw%2BOyH9MnHMGJWbaDk65JuR2hKD7lV4MNA%2FIz91%2B%2FalA81sLSDRzmj4E0XewCcTQaZQOYKC0WZWA9GEz6FvRNxnhpKUx10TGJx%2FCy1RS6TPzcoZypLgUZugh0gQOC0uCbhTWrjGyk9dEwwQlxbsImwxn02jUletPhP%2B7Hk%2BE5mZI8HklphnBHyfuudGUd1D1yCbhVF3uNFmB4e5KZ%2Fq1e4HyWJHTZKlwiCY4x7WtgDbcQUTLhawxGiRenB4rTppJp5Aag2VdwjWSOJBQrs0hdzWDDXFzxmTETs7MlrXRmohzKS9DzPMN0lPvH%2BfzT0%2FLu8UHUYUw3N4lks8T%2FpM%2Bce3ocpnSRiX4q5mMUaAMDwN82Y9GWWsnHz81xOSKzkfQbCOaY0rWAb5ZhyERQuBviTD4BcVp4fdocIIKKsu3fzjoHhU43w2%2B56an8XDRtPLeOoZ0WPUGzqP4LUErZYI8LAAA%3D)). The file mainly shows the corruption details and may not reflect what you actually do. Please refer to the steps below

Drop 4 Items.notes: Drop the 4 things you have 3 of. Shroom, Pepper, Durian, Endura Carrot

Hold 5 Items.notes: Hold the 4 you just dropped + wood

Sell 6 Items.notes: Sell the 5 you just held + naydra fang

Sell all but 7.notes: Things to NOT sell: Lotus, Carrot, Shaft, Spring, Core, Amber, Razorshroom

Hateno: (^=) RELOAD. Check you have 22 slots of materials (1 page + 2)

.item(1st Core, Amber + all 2 Screws).notes: EXTREMELY IMPORTANT: If you get a core from stalkers, drop ALL 2 cores instead of the first one only. This is because we need to put cores behind the fairy

_Cook<4 Razor + 1 Shroom>.notes: Cooking ORDER MATTERS. However as long as speedfood is second, you will be fine.

Hateno: Equip RGC and Steel Lizal Shield
(^=) RELOAD -> SAVE (Corruption, don't sync gamedata) -> RELOAD Autosave

_Tod::Morning.notes: If you are fast enough, it should be before Bolson is awake, which means we need to set TOD

_Chest<Ancient Core>.notes: If you forget this one, there is a backup later in Ketoh Wawai (dark forest shrine)

Medoh: Finish Divine Beast Vah Medoh quest

_Chest<5 Shock Arrow>.notes: AA enemies so they don't bother you

BLSS .dir(E) + .dir(E) + .dir(E).notes: Lightning pedestal on cliff. Shoot with FDB

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai. Put the wood right next to a luminous stone ore and shoot the ore with normal arrow. Make noon during or before melting ice

_Equipment::Weapon<Ice Rod>.notes: Light your arrows and shoot wizarobe

_Shrine::KuhTakkar.notes: Melt ice with piles of wood

Naboris: BLSS .dir(S) to Gerudo, talk to Benja

_Material<Flint>.notes: If you already have one, can skip this

Naboris: BLSS or Super .dir(SW) to Gerudo Town

_Npc<Horse Quest>.notes: AA a boko on horse and take his horse

.dir(<W) + .dir(<<W) Turn.notes: can also BLSS but it's a bit monkaSTEER

Kill .enemy(Kohga).notes: Phase 1: spam AA after screen goes out. Phase 2: wait for the ball to go above, shoot 2 AA, turn around and backflip over the hole, spam AA. Phase 3: Mag the ball to kohga from the side and press B as the ball goes over the edge of the hole. Or just do normal kill

_Shop<All Fire + Shock>.notes: Fire for shrines, shock for Ruta + fighting stuff. Technically only need less than 10 fire arrows, but just in case

Naboris: Ride sand seal .dir(SW) to Misae Suma

Thunderblight.notes: Stasis, GEB 2 body 3 head. (bomb self after exiting beast in case ragdoll glitch fails)

Naboris: Finish Divine Beast Vah Naboris quest

_Snap::Quest<Blupee>.notes: If it doesn't spawn, just skip this one and snap another later in Akkala

Ruta: Finish Divine Beast Vah Ruta quest

_Chest<Lightscale Trident>.notes: Don't throw away. For durability transfer later

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: At SPA area 8PM to 7AM, otherwise fixing pillars. If you mess up too much it will be after 7AM, in which case it will be better to do diving quest first, then fronk, then WB to shrine from fronk, and do lynel lady on second visit

Kill .enemy(Octorok).notes: Get Octoballoon. Not guaranteed, 84%. We do the shrine so that it's less time loss to rng

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Balloon Girl (7AM-8PM), Darner Girl (8AM-8PM) and Greyson (>9PM). If it's after 3PM, it will be really tight to make it for Darner Girl, and if you set TOD at darner girl, you have to set TOD again for Greyson. So just setting it once here is better.

_Shrine::NamikaOzz.notes: Eat ATK 3, stasis + 4AA headshots with GEB. Snap. Grab axe and Frostspear in chest

.gale() + BLSS .dir(E).notes: Can skip gale here and save for Gut Check

_Npc<Darner Quest>.notes: Talk to big sis give flower, 2nd option, then little sis, big sis, little sis, big sis

_Material<2 Apples>.notes: 1 for baked apple, 1 for fruit cake

.dir(N) to tree.notes: Pick up the shock arrows so Link doesn't get distracted

_Material<10 Lizards>.notes: Get 1-2 flints here in case rng bad later

_Npc<Greyson>.notes: Should be night time already. If not, make night

.!!(TRANSMUTATE).notes: Equip trident, Drop flints, then overload. Equip RGC, hold smuggle 5 rushrooms, sell all, pick up flints, unhold, buy goron spice, slam attack

_Tod::Night.notes: For Kilton + Xenoblade (<3AM) and East Akkala Stable (>5AM)

_Npc<Gut Check Challenge>.notes: 2 WB up to the final 5 red rupees

_Equipment::Weapon<Korok Leaf>.notes: For Voo Lota quest and blue flame later

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: Snap multiple to be safe. Don't have to talk

.dir(NW) to stalkers.notes: Land in the middle of them so you attract both, use falcon bow and aim a tiny bit above eye

Smuggle blue flame.notes: If you don't have any wood weapon, there's a moblin nearby with one

_Npc<Robbie>.notes: Your AA would reset to 999 after he gives you 3

Kill .enemy(Lynel).notes: Eat attack food, headshot with shock arrows, spin to win with RGC, can eat stam food to maintain spin

_Snap::Quest<Big Sword>.notes: You can snap from where the lynel was. Also keep an eye on Farosh and shoot a scale

_Npc::Gerudo<Molduga Guts Lady>.notes: If after 2PM, she will be in front of Riju's palace

Gerudo: Climb up + BLSS .dir(NE) to Kara Kara Bazaar

_Npc::Gerudo<Rhondson>.notes: Need to take off gerudo outfit. Equip Flamebreaker

.dir(E>) Turn + .dir(E).notes: Land on northmost statue with ball

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Suma Sahma. You can delay this according to your speed

_Shrine::SumaSahma.notes: 4:00pm-5:30pm. After 4:40 use cryo block. Read journal on the way to the shrine

_Tod::Morning.notes: For quest guy here and Goron city quests

_Npc<Thunder Magnet>.notes: She will be inside if thundering, Talk twice

_Tod::Morning.notes: For quest at Lurelin, Hateno, and Xenoblade TOD

_Npc<A Gift of Nightshade>.notes: Talk to man twice, Talk to woman twice

.fury() the camp.notes: For watch tower bokos left after fury, bomb arrow to destroy the entire tower

_Npc<Old Man>.notes: On left dock or inside house if raining

_Npc<Dad>.notes: He will be inside house if rain

_Npc<A Fragmented Monument>.notes: Talk twice then crouch on pedestal

SQ .dir(NE) to talus quest.notes: GC quests 8AM - 8PM. Make noon if not

Rudania: Finish Divine Beast Vah Rudania quest

_Npc<Start Oaki>.notes: Oaki takes a fix amount of time to walk, so anything you do here shouldn't lose time

+_Material<Baked Apple>.notes: Pick up sunshroom so you don't get updraft

Equip Fire Rod.notes: When you pull MS, the equipped weapon will get 40 durability

_Shrine::DaagChokah.notes: Can approach Oaki after "Woo! I finally made it!"

.dir(S>) + .dir(<W) Turn midair.notes: If you already have raw meat, use gale here and midair. Skip the mountain goats

.dir(<E) + BLSS .dir(N).notes: If you somehow didn't get 3 screws from yunobo escort, kill a stalker at central hyrule

_Npc<Flower Lady>.notes: Faster to run to her and talk

_Tod::Night.notes: For Xenoblade and potentially skip BM at Ya Naga (should not happen if you are fast enough). If it's after 7PM you don't need to make night

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing for Bareeda Naag is slightly tight

_Warp::VahMedoh.notes: Coordinates in rito might not be accurate

_Npc<Mom>.notes: Talk twice, second time after fade out

Kakariko: All the way at the back

.dir(N) Turn to Tarrey Town.notes: This time he is by Rhonson

_Warp::Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: Need to be not raining for Koko. Make noon until it's not raining

.dir(<W) To cucoo by shrine.notes: 2 Cucoos, talk to cucco man, play tag with cottla, 3 cucoos, talk to pikango, Koko, make night

_Npc::SheikaMale<Koko's Kitchen>.notes: (Koko's Kitchen, Cooking with Koko, Koko Cuisine, Koko's Specialty)

_Tod::Night.notes: For the night cucoo + firefly. Cannot be raining or there won't be fireflies

_Npc::SheikaFemale<By Firefly's Light>.notes: Grab 5 fireflies as you run toward the house, talk twice, drop fireflies

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveller Sword>.notes: Make sure you stay close to Dorian and keep him in view

_Equipment::Weapon<Windcleaver>.notes: Make sure you have empty slot. The windcleaver might despawn after the cutscene so make sure to pick it up

_Npc<Horse Guy>.notes: B, talk again, ride horse to him

_Npc<Nebb>.notes: Show 8 weapons, ancient short sword last

_Npc<Secret of the Cedars Lady>.notes: Cannot do this quest when raining

_Npc<Cricket Quest>.notes: Talk to guy, talk to lady in inn, talk to guy twice

_Shrine::JitanSami.notes: You don't need to free Naydra for the quest

BLSS .dir(<W) + .dir(W>) + .dir(<N).notes: Can also WB, but wind is annoying

_Warp::Shrine::ShadaNaw.notes: Should be night already, make night if earlier than 8:20pm

Look Sky .dir(S).notes: Make sure shooting star hits ground before going to shrine

Snowball throw + Stasis MAX.notes: Throw snowball up hill and let it roll almost all the way down

.dir(<<E) Turn to stable.notes: Glide to a rock to the left for a better angle

_Npc<Leviathan Bones>.notes: Talk to any of 3, then talk once to each

Get Skew Bounce.notes: Can also just kill him normally
